subject: RE: Action Required: Complete Your Flock Safety Account Activation
body:
You don't often get email from support@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi there,
 
Thank you for contacting support! You should receive an email in your inbox soon! Please be sure to check your spam folder if you don't see it in your inbox. 
 
 
 
Thank you,
Tressa
 
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: WILLIAMS Jeremy K [jwilliams@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 4/17/2025, 11:17 AM
To: hello@flocksafety.com
Subject: RE: Action Required: Complete Your Flock Safety Account Activation



Good morning,

 

Can someone please resend the setup link so I can activate my account?

 

Thanks!

 

Jeremy Williams

Lieutenant, Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5139 work

 



 

 

 

From: hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com <hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com> On Behalf Of hello@flocksafety.com
Sent: Thursday, November 21, 2024 12:27 PM
To: WILLIAMS Jeremy K <JWilliams@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Action Required: Complete Your Flock Safety Account Activation

 

	You don't often get email from hello@flocksafety.com hello@flocksafety.com . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  

	

[EXTERNAL ?]

 

 <https://flock-public-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/flock-safety-dark-green-logo.png> 

 

 

 

Welcome to the Flock.

 

Your Flock Safety account is now active. Please click the box below within the next 96 hours to create your account. 

 

CREATE YOUR ACCOUNT https://login.flocksafety.com/u/reset-verify?ticket=zWl4fxDuya37JGJyjHbDNysvqjRKr1Cl# 

 

After 96 hours, this link will expire. If 96 hours have passed, please click here https://users.flocksafety.com/passwordReset?email=jwilliams%40eugene-or.gov . 

Be sure to save the website to your bookmarks or favorites for easy future access. If you ever have any questions, our Customer Support team is always here for you.

 

 

 

 

Problems or questions?

 

 support@flocksafety.com 



support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com 



 support@flocksafety.com 



+1 (866) 901-1781



 



 

 

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to hello+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com hello+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com .
 <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000gaerZ&from=ext>
